long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bundole is a web application that is in beta version but offering promising features! It helps you manage links to web pages (articles) that you would like to review, research, blog or share. You may use it as a bookmark manager, allows you to have  instant search for all your added pages by their titles, descriptions from their publishers; or by tags you add to them.

This Chrome extension is a must-have if you already use Bundole. When seeing a page that you want to add, simply click the extension icon on Chrome browser to add it into your Bundole account!

Don't have a Bundole account yet ? Request an invite code at: https://www.bundole.com/account/requestinvite
